page.title: 16RECREATION CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content:
{WARLASS No equipment is needed for this game for any number of players. One or two children are 'on' and they call out another person's name or 'Warlass'. If Warlass is called, everybody has to run. The players have to dodge those who are 'on'. Once caught, the player is also 'on' with them.
{PIGGY-BACK FIGHTS No equipment is needed for this game for any number of players. You have to carry a partner on your back and must try to knock the other pairs over whilst staying upright yourself.
